doc.title: Late Date with Sari
doc.plot: Sari Locker, talk show host and sexuality educator, candidly discussed sex and relationships with groups of regular people who revealed intimate details of their personal lives. Sari also provided advice and information in this 30 minute talk show which aired six nights each week on Lifetime. It was awarded "Best Talk Show" Gracie Allen Award by the American Women in Television in 1996.
